title: New: Ottilia – …and then he said
content:
Photo: Lovisa Ranta

Got to give credit to my friend Darragh aka Sacred Animals for sending this gem over to me.

As Ottilia weeps ‘but don’t you fall for me’, it’s a bizarre paradox, where her cracking voice and raw guitar sound combine to conjure up the reverse effect, leaving the listener completely and utterly head over heels in love with her. With the look, the songs and the ambition, Ottilia is going to go far, and deservedly so.

…and then he said
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
